mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RSVT_TBL (R_NO, M_NO, P_NO, STRT_R_DATE, RTRN_R_DATE) VALUES(rsvt_seq.nextval, #{m_no}, #{p_no}, TO_DATE(#{strt_r_date}, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), TO_DATE(#{rtrn_r_date}, 'YYYY/MM/DD'))
mapper.select: SELECT A.* ,(SELECT B.UPLOADPATH || '\' || B.UUID || '_' || B.FILENAME FROM PRODUCT_IMAGE B WHERE A.P_NO = B.P_NO AND ROWNUM =1) AS img_url ,TO_CHAR(STRT_R_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS strt_r_date ,TO_CHAR(RTRN_R_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS rtrn_r_date FROM PRODUCT A JOIN RSVT_TBL C ON A.P_NO = C.P_NO WHERE M_NO = #{m_no}
